name: Tale of Dead and re-Dead
description:
Greetings Valiant Knight !

Your Princess has been kidnapped ! How will you saved her ? By killing all the bad guys ? Is there another way ?

This game was originally created for the Wowie Jam #3 (2021)
Theme : "Failure is Progress".

Better experience with Windows version Convenient (but may be laggy) with Web version Controls:
  • Press any-key to start playing
  • Move: WASD / Arrow Key / Gamepad-Left-Stick
  • Hit : Space / Gamepad-A
  • Protect Yourself : Shift / Gamepad-B
Credits
  • Programming and Game Design : Frelude
  • Graphics : Madélou
  •  Music :
    • Folk Round by Kevin MacLeod
      Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3770-folk-round
      License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
    • Moorland by Kevin MacLeod
      Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4079-moorland
      License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
    • Fiddles McGinty by Kevin MacLeod
      Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3747-fiddles-mcginty
      License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
  • Font
    •  https://www.dafont.com/fr/duralith.font
    • https://www.dafont.com/fr/irishuncialfabeta.font
Re-Upload to fix an Issue : Some person can't hit play in the introduction screen.
